snippet: Oprah Winfrey said her struggling television network, OWN, was unveiled too early, before it was ready, but said she would stick with it and try to build it into a success.
abstract: Oprah Winfrey said her struggling television network, OWN, was unveiled too early, before it was ready, but said she would stick with it and try to build it into a success.

headline.main: Winfrey on OWN: 'Had I Known It Was This Difficult, I Might Have Done Something Else'
